title: From India, Guterres calls for $3 billion fund to ensure AI benefits all
content: The future of Artificial Intelligence “cannot be decided by a handful of countries or left to the whims of a few billionaires,” the UN Secretary-General told the AI Impact Summit in New Delhi on Thursday, calling for a Global Fund to help developing nations to better access these technologies.
sourceTitle: UN News - Global perspective Human stories
sourceDescription: UN News - Global perspective Human stories | SDGs

title: Decades of gains overshadowed as Asia-Pacific falls behind on sustainable development targets
content: Climate inaction, biodiversity loss and rising emissions are pushing Asia and the Pacific further off course on the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), with the region set to miss nearly nine out of ten targets by 2030, the United Nations has warned.
sourceTitle: UN News - Global perspective Human stories
sourceDescription: UN News - Global perspective Human stories | SDGs

title: Floods, drought and insecurity drive acute hunger for 7.5 million in Pakistan
content: After a year that saw heavy monsoon floods, prolonged drought and dry spells, and a surge in violence, 7.5 million people in Pakistan face high levels of food insecurity and malnutrition according to a report from the global hunger monitor.
sourceTitle: UN News - Global perspective Human stories
sourceDescription: UN News - Global perspective Human stories | SDGs

title: UN forum calls for overhaul of agrifood systems
content: Rising food prices and declining farm incomes are putting increasing pressure on the global food system, with up to 720 million people facing hunger last year, and billions more struggling to afford healthy diets.
sourceTitle: UN News - Global perspective Human stories
sourceDescription: UN News - Global perspective Human stories | SDGs

title: UN social policy commission closes with calls to turn pledges into action
content: With inequality deepening and trust in public institutions under strain, the UN’s main forum on social policy wrapped up its annual session on Tuesday with a renewed push to turn global commitments on social justice into action.
sourceTitle: UN News - Global perspective Human stories
sourceDescription: UN News - Global perspective Human stories | SDGs
